fn.p: Competing Interests: The authors declare that no competing interests exist. Research Designs, the affiliation for one of our authors (Francis Bowles), is not a commercial affiliation nor is Francis Bowles an employee. Research Designs is the name he uses as a sole proprietor to provide highly specialized design services for environmental research to investigators wishing to do ecosystem manipulation experiments. Bowles is also a collaborator on other research projects at Hubbard Brook Experimental Forest and frequently volunteers his time to help with instrumentation problems for both Hubbard Brook and the U.S. Forest Service. From a financial standpoint, he is an academic scientist who, when compensated, is paid from grants.
